attributes.action: Football - ask the Football Association to reverse their decision not to charge Wigan’s Callum McManaman
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on the government to ask the Football Association to reverse their decision not to charge Wigan’s Callum McManaman for his tackle on Newcastle’s Massadio Haidara.

The FA is allowed to take retrospective action for ‘exceptional’ incidents – and this challenge should have been judged as just that.
